name: Human Rights Statistics
title: WCAS STAT 370-0-20 Human Rights Statistics
enrl_requirement:
Enrollment Requirements: Pre-registration is reserved for Statistics Majors and Minors only.

Prerequisites: Students must have completed any two of the following courses: STAT 325, STAT 350, STAT 320-2, STAT 320-3, ECON 381-1, ECON 381-2, MMSS 386-1, MMSS 386-2, IEMS 303, IEMS 304; or receive permission from instructor to enroll in this course.

descriptions.name: Overview of Class
descriptions.value: Contact the department for further information

subject: STAT
